metadata.title: CVE-2017-6815 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In WordPress before 4.7.3 (wp-includes/pluggable.php), control characterscan trick redirect URL validation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentythree - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.3+dfsg-1').
